name: Dealbreaker
firstNightReminder: Have the Dealbreaker indicate 1 or 2. If they indicate 1, indicate a drunk/poisoned player or indicate a no if there are none. If they indicate a 2, show them a out-of-play character token.
otherNightReminder: Have the Dealbreaker indicate 1 or 2. If they indicate 1, indicate a drunk/poisoned player or indicate a no if there are none. If they indicate a 2, show them a out-of-play character token.
ability: Each night you may choose to learn either 1) a player that is drunk/poisoned OR; 2) a character that is not in play.
